componentInstanceProperties.value: How to identify what courseware fits best in your classroom

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: There are thousands of educational technology products on the market today, and many call themselves courseware, but how do you identify one that fits your individual needs? We’ve created a beginner's guide to understanding and selecting the best courseware for you and your students, check it out below!

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Ready to find your courseware?

 
Visit our Tech Scout page to find which partner product best suits your needs!
